|dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8382M Multi-Layer Managed :Switch Controller w/ Embedded [[MIPS 4KEc]] @500MHz *Co-processor: [[Nuvoton]] [https://www.nuvoton.com/products/microcontrollers/arm-cortex-m0-mcus/m051-base-series/m0516lde/?__locale=en M0516LDE] to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR3) *LAN: 24x Gigabit 802.3at PoE Ethernet ports, :4x GbE RJ45/SFP Shared slots, :56Gbps switching capacity *PoE: 802.3af, 802.3at (PoE+), 370W PoE budget *Rack mountable (1U, 19") ==Links of Interest== *[https://eu.dlink.com/be/nl/-/media/business_products/dgs/dgs-1210/datasheet/dgs_1210_series_f1_datasheet_en_eu.pdf Datasheet] *[https://svanheule.net/switches/dgs-1210_series ''D-Link DGS-1210'' series on '''svanheule''' wiki] 
Revision	Port variants			Hardware platform

A1		10P, 16, 24, 48			Marvell
B1		10P, 20, 28(P), 52		Marvell
C1		10(P), 20, 28(P), 52(P/MP)	Broadcom
F1		10(P/MP), 26, 28(P/MP), 52(MP)	Realtek RTL838x
G1		8P, 10, 16, 24(P), 48		Realtek RTL838x
R1		10(P/MP),26,28(P/MP),52(MP/MPP)	32MB/256MB
